comment: this class was... interesting.  There were two tests, one paper, and a group project.  She just seemed to have a lot going on in her personal life so she would cancel class often.  You should take her only if you don't mind a "loose" structure class room

Dr. Lesa Hope made the class very fun and interactive between students. She has a lot of knowledge about the field as well. There was a group project, 2 test, and a paper.  The class was something I looked forward to and I was able to learn a lot, especially while working on the group project. I'd take class again!
